src:
Кристина Четырина назначена новым заместителем главы администрации города Тамбова

02 Nov 2019

С 1 ноября и.о. заместителя главы администрации города Тамбова по вопросам экономики назначена Кристина Четырина. 28-летняя Кристина Сергеевна имеет два высших образования ТГУ им. Г.Р. Державина по специальностям «Государственное и муниципальное управление» и «Юриспруденция».
Ранее работала главным специалистом отдела в администрации области, а потом помощником заместителя главы администрации области Александра Ганова. Последнее место работы руководитель проекта в ООО «Ладесол-Тамбов», генеральный директор компаний: ООО «ЭнергоЦентр-Уварово» и ООО «УК Энергоцентр».

text:
The ISS launches the American cargo spacecraft Cygnus
02 Nov 2019, 00:02 by Gubanoff
American spacecraft Cygnus launches for ISSInterfax - Military News Agency - information on the military-political situation in the country, the activities of the Ministry of Defense and other power ministries, about ... www.militarynews.ru
Washington. November 2. INTERFAX - US Antares launch vehicle with Cygnus cargo spacecraft launches for the International Space Station (ISS) on Saturday, according to the US National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA). The launch is scheduled for 09:59 US Eastern time (16: 59 Moscow time) from the NASA Wallops cosmodrome, which is located on the island of the same name off the Atlantic coast of the US state of Virginia. According to NASA, weather conditions in the cosmodrome area are 95% favorable for launching. us with the ISS is scheduled for November 4. It will be carried out by capturing the Canadarm – 2 station remote arm-manipulator that has approached the truck’s station and then attaching it to the American Unity module. Launch is carried out under a NASA commercial contract with Northrop Grumman, which owns the launch vehicle and the automatic cargo spacecraft . Cygnus will have to deliver about 3.7 tons of cargo, including food, as well as equipment and materials for dozens of scientific research, to the ISS. This will be the 12th flight of the Northrop Grumman spacecraft to the ISS. There was also another unsuccessful launch in 2014, when the ship did not reach the station due to the Antares launch vehicle accident. The first successful launch of Cygnus took place on September 18, 2013. It was reported that on the eve of the Japanese spacecraft HTV – 8 (Kounotori 8 - “White Stork 8”) undocked from the ISS. On September 28, he delivered over four tons of cargo to the station. The ship was in the ISS for five weeks. On November 2, a Japanese “truck” loaded with debris and waste from the station will be taken out of orbit and burned in the Earth’s dense atmosphere.
